title: Photograph, "Fountain in bronze", ca. 1890
medium: photographic print on heavy glossy paper
provenance: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
creditline: Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters
description: Vertical rectangle. The nude figure of a boy, standing, faces the viewer. The arms are upraised. He carries a basin on his head and stands on a pedestal in the form of a vessel with a grotesque head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Photograph, "Fountain in bronze", ca. 1890.
ca. 1890. photographic print on heavy glossy paper. Gift of the American Academy of Arts and Letters. 1955-38-51.
